paragraph.paragraph:
The descendants view
/images/eiffelstudio/icons/icon_format_descendants_color.gif displays all the classes which inherit from the current class,directly or not, using a tree-like indented layout. It is available through the Class tab of the
/tools/eiffelstudio/reference/05_general_interface_description/20_eiffelstudio_window_overview.xml context tool .
